entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing drizzle or drizzle. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing drizzle or flurries beginning this evening then changing to drizzle or rain showers overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016
